name: The Grim Reaper
description:
Heroes of the Far East #4

A Demon lurked the land.

Something evil, something cursed was summoned in the midst of the battlefield long ago by the dreaded dark shaman. In an attempt to end the long war, the shaman brought an ancient demon from the depths of the hell itself.

Taking the remains and the corpses of thousands of soldiers who fell, molding their soul into something corrupted and malevolent. Equipped with a scythe like weapon. the Demon did brought end to the war, by massacring almost everyone. Very few survived.

By the end of the war, the Demon gained a nickname of "The Grim Reaper".
